arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"PRODUCT_TYP\\" as \\"PRODUCT_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\" as \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\") as \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" as \\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"DEFECT_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"DEFECT_QTY\\"), 'TM9') " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\", " +" M_WH.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"MRP_FLG\\" as \\"MRP_FLG\\", " +" to_char(M_WH.\\"WH_TYP\\") as \\"WH_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_WH.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"insert into " +" T_RCV_ISSUE(\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_TYP\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP\\", \\"STOCK_UPD_TYP\\", \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"CONS_TYP\\",\\"LOT_NO\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?) * - 1, TO_DATE(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?)"
"select " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +"from " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"

"select " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ONEROUS_FLG\\" as \\"ONEROUS_FLG\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?) " +"order by " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" desc"

"insert into " +" T_RCV_ISSUE_ITEM(\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\", \\"PRODUCT_TYP\\", \\"SBCNT_PUCH_TYP\\", \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", \\"CONS_TYP\\", \\"NON_PLANNED_CAUSE_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"

"SELECT " +" JOB_ODR_CD " +"FROM " +" T_OD " +"WHERE " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO = 0 " +" AND PARENT_OD_NO IS NOT NULL " +" AND DM_STS_TYP <> 9"
"SELECT " +" TJO.MODIFY_COUNT AS MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR TJO " +"WHERE " +" TJO.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND TJO.PLANT_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" OD.ODR_STS_TYP AS ODR_STS_TYP " +"FROM " +" T_OD OD " +"WHERE " +" OD.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND OD.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND OD.JOB_ODR_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" MPG.MODIFY_COUNT AS MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" M_PROC_GRP MPG " +"WHERE " +" MPG.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND MPG.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND MPG.PROC_CD = ?"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_UNPLND_ISS(RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD, ITEM_CD, JOB_ODR_CD, WH_CD, RCV_ISSUE_QTY, RCV_ISSUE_DATE, PARENT_ITEM_CD, PARENT_JOB_ODR_CD, ISSUE_PROC_CD) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?)"

"SELECT " +" NVL(SUM(UI.RCV_ISSUE_QTY), 0) AS SUM_RCV_ISSUE_QTY " +"FROM " +" T_UNPLND_ISS UI " +"WHERE " +" TO_CHAR(UI.RCV_ISSUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM') = SUBSTR(?, 1, 7) " +" AND UI.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND NVL(UI.JOB_ODR_CD, '%') = NVL(?, '%') " +" AND UI.PARENT_ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND NVL(UI.PARENT_JOB_ODR_CD, '%') = NVL(?, '%') " +" AND NVL(UI.ISSUE_PROC_CD, '%') = NVL(?, '%')"
"SELECT " +" VALUE " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" NAME = 'PAST_RESULT_ENTRY_TYP'"
"SELECT " +" PROC_EXEC_DATE " +"FROM " +" SYS_ACTUAL_COST_CTRL_AC " +"WHERE " +" PLANT_CD = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_LOT_STOCK.STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY, 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY, " +" to_char(T_LOT_STOCK.DEFECT_QTY, 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as DEFECT_QTY, " +" to_char((T_LOT_STOCK.STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY - T_LOT_STOCK.ALCD_QTY), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as ALLOCABLE_QTY " +"from " +" T_LOT_STOCK " +"where " +" T_LOT_STOCK.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_STOCK.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_STOCK.LOT_NO = ?"
"select " +" T_LOT_CTRL.\\"LOT_NO\\" as \\"LOT_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_LOT_CTRL " +"where " +" T_LOT_CTRL.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_CTRL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_RCV_ISSUE_AI_IF_DATA(RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD, ACCT_CD, DEPT_CD, PJ_CD, SEG_CONTENTS1, SEG_CONTENTS2, SEG_CONTENTS3, SEG_CONTENTS4, IF_FLG, IF_DATE) " +"VALUES " +" (?, DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), ?, DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), 0, NULL)"

"SELECT " +" V_DEPT_CD.COMPANY_CD, " +" V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_CD, " +" V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_NAME " +"FROM " +" V_DEPT_CD, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" COMPANY_CD " +" FROM " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" WHERE " +" CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" ) SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"WHERE " +" V_DEPT_CD.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" AND V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +"FROM " +" V_ACCT_CD"
"SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +"FROM " +" V_PJ_CD"
"SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +"FROM " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_1"
"SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +"FROM " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_2"
"SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +"FROM " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_3"
"SELECT " +" VALUE, " +" DISPLAY_NAME " +"FROM " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_4"
"select " +" V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_NAME " +"from " +" V_DEPT_CD " +"WHERE " +" V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_CD = ?"
